main event: A witness reported seeing an oval-shaped, silvery object approximately 30 feet in diameter, moving at a high rate of speed over the area. The object was observed for about 10-15 seconds before disappearing.
interesting points: The witness is an employee of the Environmental Control Division of the Aeronautical Systems Division, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base and had observed similar objects in the past.
The witness was considered a credible observer by the investigators.
The object hovered for about 15 minutes before disappearing.
The sighting occurred 4 miles north of Hamilton, Ohio, and 9 miles east of Oxford, Ohio.
The report notes that there were no photographs provided with the case file.
witnesses: 1 witness, an employee of the Environmental Control Division of the Aeronautical Systems Division, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base
